entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
